name: Netflix International B.V.
goal: Netflix is the world's leading internet entertainment service with over 139 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, documentaries and feature films across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can watch as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, on any internet-connected screen. Members can play, pause and resume watching, all without commercials or commitments.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Single market
euInitiatives: Audiovisual media services, culture, net neutrality, internet access, data privacy, e-commerce, copyright, cross border access
